description: You can use any white fish you like in this simple but tasty pasta puttanesca dish.
name: Seafood Pasta Puttanesca Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the linguine according to pack instructions, drain well and tip into the pan with the sauce. Flake the cod and add to the pan along with the parsley and lemon zest, toss well and serve.
